'''William O’Connor''' ([[21 May]] [[1951]] - [[31 January]] [[2018]]) was an American author and fantasy artist.<ref name=CCGA>{{CCGA|entry=O’Connor, William M.}}, p. 192</ref><ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20180204124017/http://nthfh.com/tribute/details/1959/William-O-Connor/obituary.html|articlename=Obituary of William O'Connor|website=Nolan & Taylor-Howe Funeral Home (archived)}}</ref> He was contracted by [[Iron Crown Enterprises]] to create artwork for the [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]].
